pr_title: ENT-1865: Port RoleDTO to openapi spec

timeline.message:
ENT-1865: Port RoleDTO to openapi spec
 - Added specifications of PermissionBlueprintDTO, RoleDTO 
   and UserDTO in yaml file.
 - Added Translator to convert DTOs into Model Entities
   because newly generated DTOs do not implement Info interfaces.
   1. NestedOwnerDTOTranslator
   2. PermissionBlueprintDTOTranslator
   3. RoleDTOTranslator
   4. UserDTOTranslator
 - Added test suites for above translators
 - Updated the default constructor of PermissionBlueprint to the public
   because it is used to create an empty object in PermissionBlueprintDTOTranslator.

timeline.bodyText:
You can use ArrayList constructor instead of going through stream.
new ArrayList<UserDTO>(users)
Second point. I know it was already there, but peek is intended mainly for debugging. Map would be much clearer.
.map(e -> e.users(new ArrayList<>(users)));
timeline.author: Januson

timeline.bodyText: There might be a typo. Comment says that password should be allways null on the DTO but we are testing for not null.
timeline.author: Januson

timeline.bodyText:
There is no need to be explicit with these type arguments. JVM can infer them so they can be omited.
Collections.emptySet()
timeline.author: Januson

timeline.message:
ENT-1865: Port RoleDTO to openapi spec
 - Added specifications of PermissionBlueprintDTO, RoleDTO 
   and UserDTO in yaml file.
 - Added Translator to convert DTOs into Model Entities
   because newly generated DTOs do not implement Info interfaces.
   1. NestedOwnerDTOTranslator
   2. PermissionBlueprintDTOTranslator
   3. RoleDTOTranslator
   4. UserDTOTranslator
 - Added test suites for above translators
 - Updated the default constructor of PermissionBlueprint to the public
   because it is used to create an empty object in PermissionBlueprintDTOTranslator.

timeline.bodyText: In addition to checking these for null, now that TimestampedEntityTranslator is not extended, we need to manually also translate the created/updated fields.
timeline.author: nikosmoum

replies.bodyText: Added the steps to translate created/updated.
replies.author: sonalidhome

timeline.bodyText: The created/updated fields also need to be translated here
timeline.author: nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText: A newline above this would be good for readability
timeline.author: nikosmoum

+import org.candlepin.auth.permissions.PermissionFactory;
+import org.candlepin.dto.ModelTranslator;

+import org.candlepin.model.Owner;
+import org.candlepin.model.PermissionBlueprint;
+
+/**
+ * The PermissionBlueprintDTOTranslator provides translation
+ * from PermissionBlueprintDTO to PermissionBlueprint model objects.
+ */
+public class PermissionBlueprintDTOTranslator implements
+    ObjectTranslator<PermissionBlueprintDTO, PermissionBlueprint> {
+    @Override

replies.bodyText: empty line should be above the @Override, not between class definition and javadoc
replies.author: nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText: If we're no longer using a translator to translate the owner, then the owner translation should move outside of the if(translator != null) block. And since there are no other entities being translated by a translator, then that block can be removed completely.
timeline.author: nikosmoum

replies.bodyText: Agreed, PremissionBlueprintInfo returns OwnerInfo. It does return getKey(). Hence now translated the only Key from info to DTO.
replies.author: sonalidhome

timeline.bodyText: Same here; Newline for readabiity
timeline.author: nikosmoum

replies.bodyText: Same here: the space needs to be between class definition and @Override, not javadoc and class definition
replies.author: nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText: Same here: newline above this for readability
timeline.author: nikosmoum
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,68 @@
+/**
+ * Copyright (c) 2009 - 2020 Red Hat, Inc.
+ *
+ * This software is licensed to you under the GNU General Public License,
+ * version 2 (GPLv2). There is NO WARRANTY for this software, express or
+ * implied, including the implied warranties of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS
+ * FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. You should have received a copy of GPLv2
+ * along with this software; if not, see

+ *
+ * Red Hat trademarks are not licensed under GPLv2. No permission is
+ * granted to use or replicate Red Hat trademarks that are incorporated
+ * in this software or its documentation.
+ */
+
+package org.candlepin.dto.api.v1;
+
+import org.candlepin.dto.ModelTranslator;
+import org.candlepin.dto.ObjectTranslator;
+import org.candlepin.model.User;
+import org.candlepin.util.Util;
+
+import java.util.Date;
+
+/**
+ * The UserDTOTranslator provides translation from UserDTO to User model objects.
+ */
+public class UserDTOTranslator implements ObjectTranslator<UserDTO, User> {
+    @Override

replies.bodyText: Same here: the space needs to be between class definition and @OverRide, not javadoc and class definition
replies.author: nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText: The User.setPassword method is already hashing the password, so here you're hashing it first before putting it as an argument, which means it will re-hash the hashed password. If you check the User class, both setPassword and setHashedPassword are setting the same field (one by hashing it first, the other without), so there is no need to call both setters. I'd remove the setPassword here, and leave the next call as is (setHashedPassword)
timeline.author: nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText: The User class holds this field as a primitive boolean, while the DTO as a boxed Boolean object, so we should have a null check here, because setting the primitive boolean to null would cause an NPE. In case the source's value is null, we should default the destination value (false).
timeline.author: nikosmoum
nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText: Same here: before translating, use the DTOValidator to validate there are no null elements in the users and permissions collections
timeline.author: nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText: these should all be assertEquals(<source value>, <destination value>)
timeline.author: nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText: We shouldn'e be creating any DTOs (or entities) in a translation verification test. In fact, since we moved to a manual translation of NestedOWner in PermissionBlueprintInfoTranslator, the verification should happen outside of the if (childrenGenerated) block, by a series of assertEquals calls (one for each field), and the ownerTranslatorTest field should be removed (as it is no longer needed).
timeline.author: nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText: No need to create a new Date object and then transform it into OffsetDateTime. You can use OffsetDateTime.now() directly
timeline.author: nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText: should be assertEquals between source and dest value
timeline.author: nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText:
Even though when translating from User to UserDTO we shouldn't be translating the password, when doing the opposite, the password should get translated and hashed. So I'd expect this kind of assertion here:
assertEquals(Util.hash(source.getPassword()), dest.getHashedPassword())
timeline.author: nikosmoum

timeline.message:
ENT-1865: Port RoleDTO to openapi spec
 - Added specifications of PermissionBlueprintDTO, RoleDTO 
   and UserDTO in yaml file.
 - Added Translator to convert DTOs into Model Entities
   because newly generated DTOs do not implement Info interfaces.
   1. NestedOwnerDTOTranslator
   2. PermissionBlueprintDTOTranslator
   3. RoleDTOTranslator
   4. UserDTOTranslator
 - Added test suites for above translators
 - Updated the default constructor of PermissionBlueprint to the public
   because it is used to create an empty object in PermissionBlueprintDTOTranslator.

timeline.bodyText: This is setting the Updated date by getting the Created
timeline.author: nikosmoum

timeline.bodyText: There shouldn't be a space between class javadoc and class definition. What I meant in the other comments was that there should be space between class definition and the next thing (in that case the @Override annotation of the first method
timeline.author: nikosmoum
